title: Docker Basics
description: Learn basic Docker commands and concepts in this interactive tutorial. You will run a container, list running containers, and clean up afterwards.

steps.title: Introduction
steps.description: Welcome to Docker Basics! In this tutorial, you will learn to run containers, check container status, and remove containers using Docker commands. Click Next to continue.

steps.title: Run the Hello-World Container
steps.description: Let's start by running a simple Docker container. Execute the command below to run the official `hello-world` image.

steps.title: List Containers
steps.description: Now, let's list all containers (including stopped ones) to see the effect of our command.

steps.title: Clean Up Containers
steps.description: Finally, clean up the containers you created. This command will remove all containers. (Make sure to use this only in a safe, testing environment.)

steps.title: Conclusion
steps.description: Great job! You've learned the basics of running, listing, and cleaning up Docker containers. In the next scenario, you'll dive deeper into building your own Docker images.
